argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | arwrcl.a | |- A = ( Arrow ` C ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( HomA ` C ) = ( HomA ` C ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_arwhoma | |- ( F e. A -> F e. ( ( domA ` F ) ( HomA ` C ) ( codA ` F ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_homadmcd | |- ( F e. ( ( domA ` F ) ( HomA ` C ) ( codA ` F ) ) -> F = <. ( domA ` F ) , ( codA ` F ) , ( 2nd ` F ) >. ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. A -> F = <. ( domA ` F ) , ( codA ` F ) , ( 2nd ` F ) >. ) |
